description: I hesitated to put the word 'vegan' in the title because people get such a negative reaction to it.  It's true that not all vegan baking substitutions result in a good tasting product and many times your palate has to make compromises between eating what is healthier (which isn't always the case) and taste.
title: Vegan Banana Pound Cake with Peanut Butter Streusel
